title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Family Offense Forms (Family Court Act Article 8), form 8-3 - Notice to the district attorney
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Family Offense Forms (Family Court Act Article 8), form 8-3 - Notice to the district attorney

State Regulations

Sec. 813 F.C.A. Form 8-3
(Family Offense)
9/81
FAMILY COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF ________
________
________ Petitioner, Docket

No.________
-against-
________ Respondent NOTICE TO THE
DISTRICT ATTORNEY
________
TO THE DISTRICT ATTORNEY OF ________
COUNTY
A petition, a copy of which is annexed
hereto, has been filed in this Court by the Petitioner under Article 8 of the

Family Court Act. PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that a hearing will be
held before this Court at ________, New York, on ________, 19________, at
________ o'clock in the ________ noon of that day to determine whether, in the
interests of justice, an order should be made transferring the matter to an
appropriate criminal court and ordering its prosecution as a criminal
action. Dated: ________, 19________
______________
Clerk

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Family Offense Forms
(Family Court Act Article 8), form
8-3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
